name: Mushroom Attack (TheRulerMeasure)
description:
Mushroom Attack. The world has taken over by mushrooms. Survive mushrooms attack by fighting back.

Controls:

Player 1:

A/D = left/right

W/S = Up/Down

F = Throw

Player 1:

J/L = left/right

I/K = Up/Down

; = Throw

Left/Right = Horizontal Movement

Up/Down = Change Throw Angle

Throw = Throw

How to Play:

Press "throw" to throw weapon to kill the enemy to protect the wall from being destroyed. Survive as long as you can. Avoid throwing weapon to the wall and avoid collecting mushrooms.
